explanation: Despite a mix of short-term bearish comments, the overall sentiment is bullish for BTC. Multiple users mention large potential upside targets (some even calling for 185-241k in the future and 115k on dovish Fed news), and several are asking if now is a good time to buy or swing trade. There are also confirmations of recent profitable long trades and reluctance to short from some participants. The 1-minute candlestick signal is long due to observed support, bullish patterns, and lack of conviction in shorting at current levels. Some are holding and trailing stop-losses on long positions. Negative comments are mostly short-term and reactionary rather than trend-changing.
